title: The Concise 48 Laws of Power
author: Robert Greene
description: The definitive manual for anyone interested in gaining, observing, or defending against ultimate control. Robert Greene distills 3,000 years of the history of power into 48 essential laws by drawing from the philosophies of Machiavelli, Sun Tzu, and Carl Von Clausewitz. Whether you want to advance in your career or protect yourself from those who do, this book is your strategic guide to the psychology of power and leadership.

title: The Mountain Is You: Transforming Self-Sabotage Into Self-Mastery
author: Brianna Wiest
description: "A life-changing guide to understanding why we hold ourselves back. Brianna Wiest explores the psychology of self-sabotage and provides actionable steps to build emotional intelligence and resilience. This book is perfect for anyone ready to do the inner work and turn their greatest challenges into their greatest strengths. A must-read for 2026 personal transformation

title: The Art of Seduction
author: Robert Greene
description: From the world-renowned author of 'The 48 Laws of Power,' Robert Greene delivers the ultimate guide to the most subtle, elusive, and effective form of power: Seduction. This isnâ€™t just about romance; it's about the psychological tactics used by history's greatest figures to charm, influence, and win over people. A masterful analysis of social influence that reveals how to transform your personality into a powerful tool of persuasion. Whether for business, social life, or personal relationships, this book is a must-read for mastering the art of influence."
